categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Military personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: GNR-47 was a Human male who served the Sith Empire on the Sith capital planet of Dromund Kaas where he trained fellow Imperials in the art of scavenging.

In the initial launch of Star Wars: The Old Republic, GNR-47 was not provided with a specific character model and was thus set to the default character model, which was a white outfit with red stripes. His character model was later updated to a traditional Imperial military uniform.
